00036 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00037 
00038 class Clamd extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $Name= 'clamd';
00041     public $User= '_clamav';
00042     
00043     public $NVPS= '\h';
00044     public $ConfFile= '/etc/clamd.conf';
00045     public $LogFile= '/var/log/clamd.log';
00046     
00047     public $VersionCmd= '/usr/local/sbin/clamd -V';
00048     
00049     public $PidFile= '/var/run/clamav/clamd.pid';
00050     
00051     function Clamd()
00052     {
00053         global $TmpFile;
00054         
00055         parent::Model();
00056         
00057         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/local/sbin/clamd -c /etc/clamd.conf > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00058     }
00059         
00061     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00062     {
00063         //Thu Sep 24 14:20:02 2009 -> SelfCheck: Database status OK.
00064         $re_datetime= '\w+\s+(\w+\s+\d+)\s+(\d+:\d+:\d+)\s+\d+';
00065         $re_rest= '(.*)';
00066 
00067         $re= "/^$re_datetime\s+->\s+$re_rest$/";
00068         if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00069             $cols['Date']= $match[1];
00070             $cols['Time']= $match[2];
00071             $cols['DateTime']= $cols['Date'].' '.$cols['Time'];
00072             $cols['Log']= $match[3];
00073             return TRUE;
00074         }
00075         else if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00076             $cols['DateTime']= $cols['Date'].' '.$cols['Time'];
00077             return TRUE;
00078         }
00079         return FALSE;
00080     }
00081 }
